analysis_age: The phrase "a young, motivated lawyer" will discourage many from applying.
text: . International group. Collaborative team. Career growth. This Junior Lawyer role is with a highly successful, international advisory group. The organization is expanding due to growth in business and is looking to expand its legal team with a young, motivated lawyer searching for exposure and career growth. You will join a small, boutique environment here in Malta. You will gain international exposure and training in the important fields of corporate & compliance. If you are young and motivated, this is the opportunity you are looking for. You will: Assist in legal and corporate matters. Draft and review legal documents. Maintain client files in good standing. Assist in compliance matters. Experience: University degree in law from Malta. Excellent communication skills in English. Experience in practice. Salary / Remuneration: 20, 000 – 25, 000 based on experience. For more information contact Jonas Byberg Engedal confidentially on +356 2034 1705 or email your CV to ***@accelerate. com. mt. I specialize in Legal and Corporate Service recruitment in Malta, if you wish to discuss this or other opportunities, please feel free to contact me. For more opportunities, visit our website on https://www. accelerate. com. mt/. About Accelerate – Accelerate is a Specialist Finance & Legal Recruitment Consultancy based in Malta.

{"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::614f73b0e0896354785d2c60::linkedin_mt", "source": "linkedin_mt", "country": "MT", "company": "Accelerate Finance & Legal Recruitment", "position": "Junior Lawyer - Corporate & Compliance", "notes": "", "original": "

\u00b7           International group

\u00b7           Collaborative team

\u00b7           Career growth

                   

This Junior Lawyer role is with a highly successful, international advisory group. The organization is expanding due to growth in business and is looking to expand its legal team with a young, motivated lawyer searching for exposure and career growth.

 

You will join a small, boutique environment here in Malta. You will gain international exposure and training in the important fields of corporate & compliance. If you are young and motivated, this is the opportunity you are looking for.

 

You will:

  • Assist in legal and corporate matters
  • Draft and review legal documents
  • Maintain client files in good standing
  • Assist in compliance matters

Experience: 

  • University degree in law from Malta
  • Excellent communication skills in English
  • Experience in practice

 

 

Salary / Remuneration: 20,000 \u2013 25,000 based on experience

 

 

For more information contact Jonas Byberg Engedal confidentially on +356 2034 1705 or email your CV to jonas.byberg@accelerate.com.mt

 

I specialize in Legal and Corporate Service recruitment in Malta, if you wish to discuss this or other opportunities, please feel free to contact me.

 

For more opportunities, visit our website on https://www.accelerate.com.mt/

 

About Accelerate \u2013 Accelerate is a Specialist Finance & Legal Recruitment Consultancy based in Malta

"}
